typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjDate as string,
		employeeID as integer,
		TotalHours as long,
		TotalAmount as long,
		facttimestamp as timestamp,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FactTable
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmp
FactTable, DimEmp lookup(employeeID == EmpID,
	broadcast: 'right')~> Lookup1
CheckMatch split(match,
	disjoint: false) ~> Ismatch@(IsMatch, NoMatch)
Lookup1 derive(match = isMatch()) ~> CheckMatch
Ismatch@IsMatch aggregate(groupBy(employeeID),
	ProjDate = last(ProjDate),
		TotalHours = first(TotalHours),
		TotalAmount = first(TotalAmount)) ~> PickFirst
PickFirst sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
